cURL

Python

Copy

```
curl --request PATCH \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/api/v1/accounts/{account_id}/teams/{team_id} \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --header 'api_access_token: <api-key>' \
  --data '{
  "name": "Support Team",
  "description": "This is a team of support agents",
  "allow_auto_assign": true
}'
```

#### Authorizations

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#authorization-api-access-token)

api\_access\_token

string

header

required

This token can be obtained by visiting the profile page or via rails console. Provides access to endpoints based on the user permissions levels. This token can be saved by an external system when user is created via API, to perform activities on behalf of the user.

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#parameter-account-id)

account\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the account

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#parameter-team-id)

team\_id

integer

required

The ID of the team to be updated

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#body-name)

name

string

The name of the team

Example:

`"Support Team"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#body-description)

description

string

The description of the team

Example:

`"This is a team of support agents"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#body-allow-auto-assign)

allow\_auto\_assign

boolean

If this setting is turned on, the system would automatically assign the conversation to an agent in the team while assigning the conversation to a team

Example:

`true`

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#response-id)

id

number

The ID of the team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#response-name)

name

string

The name of the team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#response-description)

description

string

The description about the team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#response-allow-auto-assign)

allow\_auto\_assign

boolean

If this setting is turned on, the system would automatically assign the conversation to an agent in the team while assigning the conversation to a team

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#response-account-id)

account\_id

number

The ID of the account with the team is a part of

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/teams/update-a-team#response-is-member)

is\_member

boolean

This field shows whether the current user is a part of the team
